crepe_madscientist_toolip:
Infected by Shimmer, you become either big or small.

Gain damage and health when big; haste and movement speed when small.
crepe_piltover_summonerenhancement: Your summoner spell cooldown are reudced to @Cooldown@s.
crepe_snowball_piltover_summary: Throw a Hextech Grenade in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up. After teleporting you leave a trail that grants movement speed to Allied Champions and allows them to mover through enemy units.
crepe_snowball_zaun_summary: Throw a Chemtech Grenade in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up. After teleporting you leave a trail that grants movement speed to Allied Champions and allows them to mover through enemy units.
